info.description: Retrieves interest condition information for products, groups and lines
info.title: Product Interest Conditions APIs

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: interestConditionId
parameters.description: This field represents the key to the product level conditions for defining interest rate.

parameters.name: interestConditionId
parameters.description: This field represents the key to the product level conditions for defining interest rate.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: interestConditionId
parameters.description: This field represents the key to the product level conditions for defining interest rate.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

interestConditionId.description: This field represents the key to the product level conditions for defining interest rate.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

fixedRate.description: A fixed rate is directly entered by the user specifying the Defined Property and is not defined by an index table.Three basic types of interest are supported by T24; Fixed, Floating, and Periodic.

floatingRate.description: Three basic types of interest are supported by T24; Fixed, Floating, and Periodic. Each of these interest types can include one or more margins and can be specified in a tiered structure.A floating interest rate is tied to a variable base rate (i.e. BASIC.INTEREST).

linkedRateIndicator.description: Defines whether the rate for a given tier is Linked

customRateIndicator.description: This is a Yes or No flag field; if this field is set to yes then Interest rate would allow input of data required for calculation for the respective Arrangements'.

minimumTierRate.description: In this field for each tier defined, a user can specify a minimum rate for the tier. This is applicable for variable and periodic rates and allows the tier rate to be controlled.

maximumTierRate.description: The maximum rate for the tier

tierNegativeRate.description: Defines whether a tier rate can be negative

marginType.description: Defines whether there are single or multiple margins to be considered while arriving at the applicable interest rate

marginOperand.description: Defines whether the marginRate should be added or subtracted from the Floating or Periodic Rate. The options are ADD or SUB.

marginRate.description: The margin rate used to adjust the specified rate of interest and to appropriately reflect any rate profit realized. The result is the nominal rate of interest.

rateTierType.description: Defines the interest or tax rate tier type e.g. Single, Level, Banded etc

linkedArrangement.description: The Arrangement to be linked for calculating the Interest Rate

code.description: The identifier of the error message

override_acceptId.description: pass the record Id to accept all its overrides
